result.name: userstyles.org - Fix site's new design (2023)
result.description: This userstyle modifies the new layout to make some sections of a userstyle page more readable. List of modifications: - Enlarge the minimum width of the style's popup. - Resize/widen "description" and "notes" to make them readable again. - Color links in "description" and "notes" to differentiate from normal text. - Move "Recommended" at the bottom. - Display source code below "Show css" and not in a popup. - Possibility to hide ads (use "customize" to enable, or use Stylus pop menu). - Slighly widened scrollbars (easier to click & scroll). - Comments moved below userstyle infos. For more userstyles and userscripts visit my programming page
